DrawMessage * drawData
 This function gets implemented by child classes to implement how to draw itself, the GraphWin calls this on all of its registered GraphicObjects.

Member Function Documentation

void GraphicsObject::undraw (  )  [inherited]

Undraws the object from a graphics window.

This produces an error if the object is not currently drawn.

Member Data Documentation

This function gets implemented by child classes to implement how to draw itself, the GraphWin calls this on all of its registered GraphicObjects.
